snippet.title: Super Cassette Vision Game: Dragon Slayer (1986 Epoch)
snippet.description:
Dragon Slayer is commonly considered one of the progenitors of the action RPG genre. The player can collect power stones and coins during the journey; the power stones increase the hero's strength, while the coins increase his hit points (health). Defeating enemies also yields experience points, which determine the amount of maximum HP the hero is able to receive.

Please like this video and subscribe to my channel for more great retro content.

#RetroGames #RetroGaming #OldGames #ClassicGames
